tech_stacks.name: Modern Web Stack
tech_stacks.description: A modern web application stack with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB database. Perfect for real-time applications and RESTful APIs.

tech_stacks.name: Enterprise Java Stack
tech_stacks.description: A robust enterprise-grade stack using Spring Boot, Angular, and PostgreSQL. Ideal for large-scale applications with complex business logic.

tech_stacks.name: Python Data Science Stack
tech_stacks.description: A comprehensive data science and machine learning stack using Python, with tools for data processing, analysis, and model deployment.

tech_stacks.name: Full Stack Python
tech_stacks.description: A complete Python-based web stack using Django and Vue.js. Great for rapid development and maintainable applications.

tech_stacks.name: Serverless Stack
tech_stacks.description: A modern serverless architecture using AWS services and React. Perfect for scalable applications with minimal infrastructure management.
